item.title: InitialPrefabs Open Source
item.description: Some of the works I’ve done that are open sourced: ImportOverrides Import Overrides is a custom gui that aims to enhance the import pipeline. When importing Textures through a custom asset post processor, you often have to set the texture settings yourself manually through code. If you’re aiming to create a visual importer, you would need to write teh GUI yourself. This package provides the GUI by default to TextureImporterSettings and TextureImporterPlatformSettings allowing you to create your own visual + scriptable import pipeline.
